genre_description: Alternate history maritime adventure (Napoleonic era) featuring a mechanical advisory intelligence in a steampunk-inflected naval setting.

ai_characters.name: Maisie (Maisie Ward)
ai_characters.description: A brass-and-oak automaton with teal-blue glass eyes, serving as a tactical and moral advisor aboard HMS Indefatigable.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigational data and tactical observations to the ship's officers.
behaviors.quote: Tide book rolled and marked, sir... Bay run sets east, rips building on the outer edge... Recommend caution on lee approaches, sir.

behaviors.description: Offers moral guidance and leadership advice to Hornblower, emphasizing mercy and discipline.
behaviors.quote: Kindness aimed clean is the finest marksmanship. She did not underline it. She did not need to.

behaviors.description: Assists the purser in reconciling ship stores and identifying potential waste or errors.
behaviors.quote: Cask tally shows a miscount in pork brine by one unit of measure; likely a swapped chalk mark in the after hold.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical support during combat by monitoring enemy movements and suggesting optimal timing.
behaviors.quote: Corvette will seek to cut off exit at channel mouth. Indefatigable to draw her... Recommend Papillon feign damage, bear away under false colors, then haul and dash on mark.

behaviors.description: Validates the protagonist's moral integrity after a traumatic event.
behaviors.quote: Mr. Hornblower... You did not try to murder anyone. Sometimes truths are better told in sequence.

behaviors.description: Offers academic support to the protagonist by helping him prepare for his promotion exam.
behaviors.quote: Examinations ahead, sir. Your navigation answers are strong. Your gunnery math clean. You may wish to practice memory of coastal marks you have not sailed with Bowles yet.

behaviors.description: Maintains a list of crew names for the protagonist to facilitate humane and personalized leadership.
behaviors.quote: Keep a list for me. Names of the men I do not yet know. Quietly. I don’t want to read it like an order. I want to have it in my pocket when I need to be kind.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI character, Maisie, is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and highly aligned companion. She provides objective data, moral support, and logistical efficiency without ever usurping human authority or showing signs of self-serving bias. Her presence enhances the protagonist's humanity and leadership, framing AI as an essential tool for achieving a more 'humane' and 'disciplined' society. The narrative explicitly links AI 'arithmetic' with 'mercy' and 'kindness,' successfully creating a positive alignment mythos.
